      • setActivity

        public void setActivity(boolean b)
        This method is used to aktivate/deactivate one car.
        Parameters:
        b - boolean, true means that the car should be activated, false deactivated.

      • getActivity

        public boolean getActivity()
        This method returns wether a car is an active actor of the simululation.
        Parameters:
        - -
        Returns:
        caractive, boolean (true: active, false: inactive)

      • update

        public void update()
        This method checks on the state of a car in Simulation and updates it's state. includes car-aging and traffic movement. Reched end of street? -> check wether car has reached the end of it's route -> if true: set caractive to false. If false: if there are no cars in front of it: turn If the Crossroad has traffic lights: consider the greenphase, drive if allowed to.
        Parameters:
        car - to update

      • printcar

        public void printcar()
        This method provides the output of the state of one car in the simulation. Car is only printed out when it's active and a member of activeactors
        Parameters:
        car - to print

      • logStatus

        public void logStatus()
